attributes.value: Views loyalty unfavorably
Values independence
Views any show of emotion as offensive
Finds introspection to be a waste of time
Sees merrymaking as a waste
Sees working hard as a foolish waste of time
Often feels discouraged
Likes to brawl
Is a dyed-in-the-wool quarreler, never missing a chance to lash out in verbal hostility
Has no confidence at all in her talent and abilities
Takes no pleasure in her talents and appearance
Does not feel the slightest need to reciprocate favors that others do for her, no matter how major the help or how much she needed it
Presents herself modestly and frowns on any flashy accoutrements
Tends to consider what others think of her
Is not a private person and freely shares details of her life
Is inattentive to detail in her own work
Cannot tolerate differences in culture, lifestyle or appearance
Hates vows, obligations, promises and other binding elements that could restrict her
Tries to keep her things orderly
Enjoys the company of others
Can easily become absorbed in art and the beauty of the natural world
Meager creativity
Good intuition
Next to no empathy
